column8: Whipwreck defeated 2 Cold Scorpio in a singles match to win both the tag team titles and the ECW World Television Championship; Cactus Jack came out and declared himself to be Mikey's partner after he won the match.

column2: The Gangstas(Mustapha Saed and New Jack)
The Dudley Boyz(Buh Buh Ray Dudley and D-Von Dudley)

column8: The Dudley Boyz defeated Kronus in a handicap match as a result of a sidelining injury sustained by Saturn. Aired 6-26-97 on TV
The Dudley Boyz won the championship via forfeit as a result of Mustapha Saed leaving the promotion before Hardcore Heaven took place.

column2: Full Blooded Italians(Little Guido and Tracy Smothers)
